channel.title: Ubuntu on girishjoshi.io
channel.description: Recent content in Ubuntu on girishjoshi.io

item.title: February 2016 frdora meetup pune
item.description: On 6-Feb-2016 it was third Fedora meetup at pune at the same venue as earlier meetups “K 104, Jasminium, Magarpatta City Pune”. Event host was Kushal Das. For this meetup the ajenda was “Debugging bugs in different applications written in C/Python in Fedora”. But after last meetup Amol and me had discussed about writing a tool like “Ip messenger” (our purpose was for file transfer) for linux which will be a nautilus plugin; so we decided that in this meetup we will do it.
